patterns: How do I change my password?
How can I reset my password?
I forgot my password how can I reset it?
responses: You can change your password by going to the Login Page and click on the Forgot Password button. After doing this you will receive a mail to reset your password
Yeah sure I can help you with that. You need to go to the Login Page and click on the Forgot Password Button. You will then receive a mail to reset your password.

patterns: How do I track my delivery ?
I have not received my order yet. How do I track it ?
When will my order be delivered
responses:
To track your delivery, follow these steps:
1. Locate the tracking number: The tracking number will be mentioned in the Order summary.
2. Click on the link provided in the Order Summary.
 3. You will be redirect to the Shipping Company's website.
4. Enter the Tracking Number.
5. View the tracking details: After you submit the tracking number, you will be directed to a page displaying the tracking details of your delivery. These details may include the current location of the package, estimated delivery date, and any updates or exceptions related to the shipment.
 6. Check for updates: Depending on the shipping carrier, you may be able to sign up for email or text notifications regarding your delivery. This will keep you updated about any changes or delays in the delivery schedule.
If you are unable to track your delivery or encounter any issues, contact the shipping carrier's customer support for assistance.
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: How do I return my product ?
I'm not satisfied with my product quality, how do I return it?
Can I exchange my product for another one?
I ordered the wrong size. Can I exchange the product for a different one ?
responses:
We understand that sometimes things don't work out as planned, so here is our return/refund policy: 
1. Returns: If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item(s) within 30 days from the date of delivery. Please ensure that the item(s) are unused, in their original packaging, and in the same condition in which you received them. To initiate a return, please contact our customer support team through the provided channels.
2. Refunds: Once we receive the returned item(s) and after inspecting their condition, we will process your refund. Depending on your original payment method, the refund will be credited back to the same source within a reasonable timeframe.
3. Return Shipping: If the return is due to a mistake on our end, such as a defective product or an incorrect item shipped, we will bear the return shipping costs. However, if the return is due to personal preference or a change of mind, you will be responsible for the return shipping expenses.
4. Exchanges: We currently do not offer direct exchanges. To exchange an item, please follow the return process mentioned above and place a new order for the desired item(s).
5. Exceptions: Certain items may be non-returnable or non-refundable due to hygiene reasons or specific conditions mentioned in the product description, such as perishable goods, personalized items, and digital downloads. Please refer to the individual product pages for any such restrictions.
Why shouldn’t you write with a broken pencil? Because it’s pointless.
Why do seagulls fly over the sea? Because if they flew over a bay, they would be bagels.
Did you hear about the claustrophobic astronaut? He just needed a little space.
